title: Can you fix this, Riot?
body:
For quite some time now, I've been getting this message for 2 or 3 log-in attempts before I actually get to log into the game.

I have no connection issues and I **ALWAYS** get this message **without fail** *every tiime that I want to try to play this game*. Usually more than once. Sometimes five times in a row and I decide to it's not worth it to log in.

Every time you click "ok" the client closes itself out completely, so this is a very annoying bug because you have to repeatedly open the launcher until you can finally log in successfully.

I would post this in "bug reports" but I'm sure it would get removed for being a connection issue even though it's not.
I've repaired and reinstalled and it still remains a problem.

replies.body: I also get this problem VERY often... but whatever it's our fault right?
If you get this message, just keep trying to log in. This morning I was able to log in on my 4th attempt. Try clicking the "Log In" button after entering your password instead of just pressing enter.

Hello Cynicatt!

After you enter the Login Screen and enter your Username/Password, your computer needs to make a consistent and stable connection to our PvP.net Server. If this fails (and you get this error message) there are two main reasons as to why:  An unstable connection or a certificate error.

Since it can be primarily two different reasons, I would like you to try some of the most common solutions first.  To that end, make sure to check out our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) and complete all of the steps there!

If it still isn't leading you into the wonderous main page of the client, then make sure to reply back to me and let me know!

First of all, thank you for your response.
I didn't think to look there before(derp). I just attempted the steps suggested for the certificate stuff, but I'm still having the issue.
I have no issues like this with any other games, so unfortunately I'm not sure what the problem could be.

It seems to happen most reliably and repeatedly when I first log in after I turn my computer on that day, once I log in successfully one time I can close the client and open it again later and successfully log in with no issues.

Honestly I would be happy if the client would just not completely close out when you hit "ok".

Thanks for following up with a reply!

Since it still seems to be consistently failing still, regardless of these steps, I would like to rule out your connection as a root cause.  I am by no means blaming your connection, but in order to find the root cause, we need to start eliminating as many possible root causes as possible.  To that end, make sure to try all of the steps in our [Connection Issues KB Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If you are still repeatedly logging in over and over again, don't give up in frustration just yet!  Make sure that you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech Team!  They can help provide more in-depth specific solutions to get this fixed.  If you do submit a ticket, include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

Can I reply to this? I am also having this issue. It also only happens the first time after restarting my computer, and once I manage to log in once, I can log in fine until I restart my computer again. Switching to a different WiFi and then switching back will sometimes cause this issue, just like restarting my computer does.

I have a fix. And it's really really dumb.

If I have my password on my clipboard, and I click ctrl+v (paste) and then hit enter as SOON as the client pops up (like less than a tenth of a second), it seems to log in fine. If I spend 3-4 seconds typing out my really long password and then hit enter, it will give me the "disconnected from PVP.net" error almost every single time and then close the client.

I'm 99% sure this means your client is derping and doing something to cause the issue while it's waiting for me to type my password, because my "fix" really makes absolutely no sense.

Yeah, none of those steps work.  On my old computer before I updated this would happen every first time I tried to login, it took maybe 3 or 4 repetitive tries to fix it with me making now settings changes.  That tells me it isnt my fault.  I got a newer computer and haven't had the problem as much, but it still occurs.  My internet is 90 mbs down, 15 up, and 9 ping, so theres no way its my fault I can't connect to your PvP.net Server.
I am also having this problem, no problems with my network though.  Just took me over ten tries to get in.

I actually thought this was just me, as its onset directly coincided with my wife and I installing web filters (to hopefully shield our young children from the wurst of the interwebz). Perhaps that's the sneaky cause? I haven't tried playing with DNS settings like the support page suggests, but maybe I'll email the filter's support for their suggestions.

I have been having the same issue for about two weeks now. I have been reading about it, it is apparently an almost 2 year problem that has not been fixed yet. Installing and reinstalling does not help, neither does messing with your Network Settings or any other advice I have read and tried. Most people are saying it has something to do with Adobe Air. It takes me even longer than 2 or 3 tries to get in, sometimes I have to try 10 times until I get in. It is weird because sometimes I log in to my smurf on the first try. I play on NA but I also have an account on EU and that one also connects usually. My internet is fine and everything else works. It is very annoying. Sometimes if I manage to play one game, it exists me or I get the "Disconnected from PVP.net" message. If I ever queue for team builder sometimes I DC and to me it looks like I am still in the lobby but in reality I am not. I really want to play but I can't....I have had this whole week off and I really wanted to play but this is making it impossible...idk if Riot can do anything about it right now, I heard they have big plans to stop lag so hopefully these issues will be a problem of the past soon...
My girlfriend has been having the same issue. She tries to log in and continually gets the same message. I'm on the same network and connected with no problem though.

It's been a couple days, and I'm still having this issue.
I didn't have any trouble logging in yesterday strangely, so I had hoped the problem was solved, but then I started experiencing it again today.

Riot had me to run WinMTR and send them the results.
So, I guess I can blame the same thing that is giving me such terrible packet loss.

Alright I got my first response.
